About.paragraph1: Our company specializes in metal casting using CMC and VMC for precise hole creation and shaping. We also perform assembly tasks involving both plastic and rubber molding. Our services include flashing and deflashing processes, and we assemble all sub-parts into complete parts. We ensure high-quality production within a short time span, utilizing a limited number of employees efficiently.

Services.name: Metal Casting
Services.text: We utilize advanced CMC and VMC technology for precise hole creation and shaping. Our expertise ensures high-quality metal components that meet strict industry standards.

Services.name: Molding
Services.text: Specializing in both plastic and rubber molding, we deliver durable components. Our advanced techniques guarantee consistency and top-notch quality for every piece.

Services.name: Flashing and Deflashing
Services.text: Our skilled technicians remove excess material to ensure clean, finished products. This process maintains the integrity and aesthetics of the final components.

Services.name: Assembly
Services.text: We meticulously assemble sub-parts into complete, functional products. Attention to detail and rigorous quality control ensure perfect fit and operation.
